title: ANNOUNCEMENT BY THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. Pursuant to clause 8 of rule XX, proceedings 
will resume on questions previously postponed.
  Votes will be taken in the following order:
  Ordering the previous question on House Resolution 600;
  Adopting House Resolution 600, if ordered;
  Ordering the previous question on House Resolution 601; and
  Adopting House Resolution 601, if ordered.
  The first electronic vote will be conducted as a 15-minute vote. 
Remaining electronic votes will be conducted as 5-minute votes.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore

doc_title: ANNOUNCEMENT BY THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE
